articles.title: Shocking: 2 minute Google Meet and 200 employees terminated ! Check details - Pune Pulse
articles.description: Since last year, there have been layoffs in various companies across the world. There is a picture of large companies laying off workers citing economic conditions. America's start-up company Frontdesk has cut the workforce at the beginning of the new year. A…
